topic.title: EMS Advance Directives Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67840-9" EMS Advance Directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] title = "EMS Advance Directives"
